name: Treacherous Ways
description:
Welcome to a changeling platformer game with two different levels. Each level has environmental features to them. Arrow Keys to move and Spacebar to jump.

There are a few bugs with spawning on checkpoints where the player will be in the ground, just jump up and your character will be fine.

Also the pause menu has problems, if the game screen is frozen just hit the pause button (p) twice.

Thank You & Enjoy
